con:config.con:query: select * from politiquevalidation where id = (select politiqueValidationId from contrat where reference = "${Contrat Antivirus#refContrat}")
select * from contrat where reference = "${Contrat Antivirus#refContrat}"
select * from elementcontractuel where contratParent = (select id from contrat where reference = "${Contrat Antivirus#refContrat}" )
select * from tracage where referenceContrat = '${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat}'
select * from bonpreparation where reference = "${Contrat Antivirus#refContrat}"
select * from bonpreparation where reference = "${Contrat Antivirus#refContrat}"
select * from elementlivraison where bonPreparationParent = (select id from bonpreparation where reference = "${Contrat Antivirus#refContrat}")
select * from tracage where referenceContrat = '${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat}'

Préparation de la livraison du produit avfw.essentiel

con:config.con:query: select * from bonpreparation where reference = "${Contrat Antivirus#refContrat}"
select * from elementlivraison where bonPreparationParent = (select id from bonpreparation where reference = "${Contrat Antivirus#refContrat}")
select * from bonpreparation where reference = "${Contrat Antivirus#refContrat}"
select * from tracage where referenceContrat = '${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat}'

con:configuration.token: Livraison du contrat ${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat} – Fin de livraison
Livraison du contrat ${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat} – Fin de livraison du produit avfwpro-confort-s

con:config.con:query: select * from movement where -- accountId = '00003870' -- and productId = 'avfwpro-confort-s' -- and minute(timediff(now(), create_date)) < 1 /*and*/ id IN ( select movement_idFK from movement_appendix_item where productReferenceId = '${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat}' ) ;

con:config.script:
def cal = Calendar.instance
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("dateDebut", String.format('%tF', cal)) log.info testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("dateDebut")
cal.roll(Calendar.MONTH, 1)
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("dateFin", String.format('%tF', cal)) log.info testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("dateFin")

con:config.con:query: select * from tracage where referenceContrat = '${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat}'

con:configuration.token: Facturation des frais de création du contrat ${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat}
Facturation récurrente pour la période du ${#TestCase#DateDebut} au ${#TestCase#DateFin} du contrat ${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat}

con:config.con:query: select * from movement where accountId = '00003870' and minute(timediff(now(), create_date)) < 1 and id IN ( select movement_idFK from movement_appendix_item where productReferenceId = '${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat}' ) ;

con:configuration.content: Abonnement Antivirus Securitoo du ${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd").format(new Date())} au ${=Calendar.instance.get(Calendar.YEAR)+"-"+(int)(Calendar.instance.get(Calendar.MONTH)+2)+"-"+Calendar.instance.get(Calendar.DATE)} (Dossier Produit : ${Contrat Antivirus#RefContrat})
